clinical_study.official_title: Rhomboid Block Versus Erector Spinae Block in Thoracotomy

lead_sponsor.agency: Kocaeli Derince Education and Research Hospital

clinical_study.source: Kocaeli Derince Education and Research Hospital

brief_summary.textblock:
Effective analgesia is very important in terms of preventing respiratory, thromboembolic complications and providing early mobilization after open thoracotomy.
Although thoracic epidural analgesia is gold standart method for this aim, it causes common side effects such as hypotension, dural puncture,motor block In recent years, with the effective use of ultrasonography, different regional anesthesia methods have been developed to prevent such complications

detailed_description.textblock:
Effective analgesia is very important in terms of preventing respiratory, thromboembolic complications and providing early mobilization after open thoracotomy.
Although thoracic epidural analgesia is gold standart method for this aim, it causes common side effects such as hypotension, dural puncture,motor block In recent years, with the effective use of ultrasonography, different regional anesthesia methods have been developed to prevent such complications.
The Erector spinae plan block is a recently developed regional block method .Adminestering of lokal anesthetic between the transver proces and erector spinae muscless provides the dorsal and ventral branch blokades of regional spinal nerve and make up the analgesia.İt have a wide range usage such as surgery of thoracal and abdominal area (Thoracothomy,hysterectomy,Lomber surgery) Rhombid block, on the other hand, is a method which make up analgesia by providing lokal anestethetic enjection between intercostal muscles and rhomboid muscles and blocks between t3- t9 levels

primary_outcome.measure: rhomboid block versus erector spinae block in thorachotomy
primary_outcome.time_frame: the study will comlete in three month
primary_outcome.description: In this study, we aimed to compare the effects of rhomboid block and erector spinae block in pain control after thoracotomy

arm_group.description: Rhombid block, on the other hand, is a method which make up analgesia by providing lokal anestethetic enjection between intercostal muscles and rhomboid muscles and blocks between t3- t9 levels

The Erector spinae plan block is a recently developed regional block method .Adminestering of lokal anesthetic between the transver proces and erector spinae muscles provides the dorsal and ventral branch blokades of regional spinal nerve and make up the analgesia.İt have a wide range usage such as surgery of thoracal and abdominal area (Thoracothomy,hysterectomy,Lomber surgery)

intervention.description: Rhombid block, on the other hand, is a method which make up analgesia by providing lokal anestethetic enjection between intercostal muscles and rhomboid muscles and blocks between t3- t9 levels

The Erector spinae plan block is a recently developed regional block method .Adminestering of lokal anesthetic between the transver proces and erector spinae muscles provides the dorsal and ventral branch blokades of regional spinal nerve and make up the analgesia.İt have a wide range usage such as surgery of thoracal and abdominal area

study_pop.textblock: 18 to 65 years old patients will including in this study. Patients Asa Scores shold be ASA1,2,3

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Patients between 18-65 years old
- ASA1,2,3 group patients
- Patients undergoing thoracotomy under general anesthesia
Exclusion Criteria:
- The patient's refusal to participate in the study
- Allergy to local anesthetics

responsible_party.investigator_affiliation: Kocaeli Derince Education and Research Hospital
